name: Scales of Fate
description:
Scales of Fate is a 2-player strategic deduction game set in the Veiled Fate universe.

Players will each represent 2 demigods and decide if they will try to help them both gain Renown or hurt one and help the other.

Each round players will choose any of the 9 demigods, sending them to the board to select actions ranging from smiting to gaining the favor of different Gods.

Players will score points equal to the space both of their demigods are on, or the gap between them on the score track. They also have a chance to lose or gain extra points if they can guess their opponent's 2 demigods correctly! The player with the most points win the game.

—description from the publisher
